# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(str::String; text_width::Int = 10)
    lines = []
    for word in split(str)
        if length(word) + sum(length, lines) > text_width
            push!(lines, "")
        end
        push!(lines, word)
    end
    return join(lines)
end
```

# Example Usage

```julia
julia> wrap_string("Hello there this is a very long string that should be wrapped at 10 characters per line. How does it look now?")
```
